body_html:
I'm having the same problem. I'm on CPUs so we can rule out CPU/GPU issues. Also occuring with Keras 2.0.8, TF 1.3, both python 2.7 and 3.5, and also a TF 1.4-dev compiled from sources. This leads me to believe it's an input feed issue.

Another note, the same code and inputs run fine on my Macbook. I'm getting the problem with a new install on a workstation. It's a VirtualBox instance running Ubuntu server 16.04.

Maybe someone could suggest an input feed diagnostic?

body:
I'm having the same problem.  I'm on CPUs so we can rule out CPU/GPU issues.  Also occuring with Keras 2.0.8, TF 1.3, both python 2.7 and 3.5, and also a TF 1.4-dev compiled from sources.  This leads me to believe it's an input feed issue.

Another note, the same code and inputs run fine on my Macbook.  I'm getting the problem with a new install on a workstation.   It's a VirtualBox instance running Ubuntu server 16.04.

Maybe someone could suggest an input feed diagnostic?
